author: wtopstaff
title: NBA Calendar
text:
By The Associated Press October 2, 2015 9:50 am 
Sept. 26 — Training camps open for teams playing international exhibition games. 
Sept. 29 — Training camps open for teams not playing international exhibition games. 
Oct. 26 — Rosters set for opening day. 
Oct. 27 — Regular season opens. 2016 
Jan. 5 — 10-day contracts can be signed. 
Jan. 10 — All contracts guaranteed for the remainder of the season. 
Feb. 12-14 — All-Star weekend, Toronto. 
Feb. 18 — Trade deadline, 3 p.m. EST. 
March 1 — Playoff eligibility waiver deadline. 
April 13 — Regular season ends. 
April 15 — Playoff rosters set, 3 p.m. EDT. 
April 16 — Playoffs begin.
